main event: A witness observed a strange flickering light in the sky over Elmhurst, Illinois on July 24, 1965.
interesting points: The object was sighted multiple times over a 30-day period,The observation lasted between 30 to 60 minutes,The light appeared bright and then dimmed,The witness reported the light moving and changing in brightness while the TV in their house was also malfunctioning,The sighting involved no physical evidence or photographs.
sighted object: a flickering light in the sky
witness description: Elwood B. Emmet, male, age 32, from St. Charles, Illinois
